definitions.title: n[m.]
definitions.body: lamb (transp. fr. preceding)—´[[כ]] abs. Le 3:7 + 5 t.; pl. [[כְּשָׂבִים]] Ge 30:32 + 6 t.;—lamb, as property Ge 30:32, Ge 30:33, Ge 30:35, Ge 30:40 (J); for sacrif. Le 1:10, Le 3:7, Le 4:35, Le 22:19, Nu 18:17, cf. Le 22:27; for food Le 7:23, cf. Le 17:3 (all P); De 14:4.
